page.title: 03DEMOGRAPHY
page.content: 52% of the population is male. There are also more young people than old, with the largest age group being 16_20. There are few single parent families living in the area and few people who live on their own. Most people who live alone are old_aged pensioners or unmarried people. Most residents are not native to the area but moved for a variety of reasons such as; employment, to care for aged relatives, for the pleasant environment, marriage and to move away from inner_city locations. Most people in Bromborough are not retired but the great majority of those who are retired are old_aged pensioners.
